bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of chuang 瘡 , sores, conditions the size of a coin developing at the location of the Great Hammer needle insertion hole in the neck, with yellow liquid seeping incessantly. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry lu 驢 quoting Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 : 天柱瘡生脊大椎上 , “The celestial pillar sores develop in the back on the Great Hammer”. writes: 天柱毒 瘡生脊大椎上 , “The celestial pillar poisoning sores develop in the back on the Great Hammer”.
